summary: try to remember the kind of september (when life was slow and oh so mellow)
title: try to remember the kind of september (when life was slow and oh so mellow)
description:
by narcissae

Pepper tries to tell herself that this is the only way. That realistically, Tony was never going to get better. It doesn’t make it any easier.

After Siberia, Tony wakes up alone in a hospital bed, and everything is wrong, but he doesn’t have time to grieve - the Mad Titan is coming, and he is Earth’s first line of defense.

Words: 300, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death, Underage
  • Categories: F/M, Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Stephen Strange, Thanos (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Peter Parker, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Ebony Maw, Gamora (Marvel), Loki (Marvel)
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Tony Stark/Stephen Strange
  • Additional Tags: Time Travel Post-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), Civil War Team Iron Man, Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Author plays fast and loose with the MCU timeline, The Black Order, Depression, Alcoholism, Elders of the Universe – Freeform, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder – PTSD, Trauma Recovery, Child Abuse, Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, Thanos’ A+ parenting

tags: stretch armstrong and the flex fighters
summary: okay but does the whole stretch monster + stretch army thing give anyone else major jackal + spider army vibes?? like the whole...
body: okay but does the whole stretch monster + stretch army thing give anyone else major jackal + spider army vibes?? like the whole premise of how the flex fighters got their powers and rook trying to recreate that plus the Normal, Respected Dude Turns Into Monster By Night concept is very reminiscent of that….

summary: try to remember the kind of september (when life was slow and oh so mellow)
title: try to remember the kind of september (when life was slow and oh so mellow)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NBw2TI

by narcissae

Pepper tries to tell herself that this is the only way. That realistically, Tony was never going to get better. It doesn’t make it any easier.

After Siberia, Tony wakes up alone in a hospital bed, and everything is wrong, but he doesn’t have time to grieve - the Mad Titan is coming, and he is Earth’s first line of defense.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Interference
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Oc7fmc

by _Lightning_ (Lightning070)

He’s always hated telephones. Especially cell phones.

These days are horrible enough without having to face that dislike of his as well, one which is not so gratuitous like the many others that make up his persona – along with being handed things and always wearing his sunglasses in public.

No, he feels like he has every reason to loathe those deceptively harmless devices.

(Or: Tony has a hard time coming to terms with the snap’s aftermath and feels like being alone might be the best decision for now. Or maybe not.)

Words: 2715, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts (mentioned), Peter Parker (mentioned), Steve Rogers (mentioned)
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), Spoilers, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Tony Angst, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Wakanda (Marvel), Grief/Mourning, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Panic Attacks, Cell Phones, Wakes & Funerals, Steve’s phone, Introspection, Guilt, Poor Tony, poor may


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Oc7fmc

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Oc7fmc

These days are horrible enough without having to face that dislike of his as well, one which is not so gratuitous like the many others that make up his persona – along with being handed things and always wearing his sunglasses in public.

No, he feels like he has every reason to loathe those deceptively harmless devices.

(Or: Tony has a hard time coming to terms with the snap’s aftermath and feels like being alone might be the best decision for now. Or maybe not.)
